segments.text: Oh my, the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just keeps coming out of the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she's focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see the puddle growing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking into her shoes, poor thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the cabinet's open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing up on that stool to get to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wow, the stool's wobbling a lot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, it looks precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky while mom's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he slips on the wet floor after, it'll be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen needs attention right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
